metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9210 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
libqpdf.a in QPDF 6.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite recursion and stack consumption) via a crafted PDF document, related to unparse functions, aka qpdf-infiniteloop3.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9210` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf18 - 7.0.0-1
qpdf - 7.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qpdf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-1').
